title: Salesforce Launches Agentforce 360
optimized_headline: Salesforce Unveils Agentforce 360: What It Means for Businesses
raw_excerpt: The platform features a hybrid reasoning engine, an agentic voice interface, context indexing and an upgraded AI agent builder tool.
raw_body: The platform features a hybrid reasoning engine, an agentic voice interface, context indexing and an upgraded AI agent builder tool.
speedrun: Salesforce has introduced Agentforce 360, a new platform designed to enhance AI interactions. It includes a hybrid reasoning engine, a voice interface, and improved tools for building AI agents. This launch aims to make AI more accessible and efficient for businesses. As companies increasingly rely on AI, having robust tools like Agentforce 360 could significantly improve customer engagement and operational efficiency.
why_it_matters: Businesses can now create more sophisticated AI interactions, improving customer service and reducing response times.
This launch reflects a broader trend towards integrating advanced AI capabilities into everyday business operations, potentially reshaping the market landscape.

lenses.eli12: Agentforce 360 is like giving businesses a smart assistant that can think and respond more naturally. With features like voice interaction and a better way to build AI tools, it helps companies connect with customers more effectively. This matters because it could make everyday interactions smoother and more efficient for everyone.
lenses.pm: For product managers and founders, Agentforce 360 addresses the growing need for effective AI solutions that enhance user experience. By streamlining the process of creating AI agents, it could lower development costs and improve efficiency. This means businesses can respond to customer needs faster and with greater accuracy.
lenses.engineer: From a technical perspective, Agentforce 360's hybrid reasoning engine combines different AI techniques to improve decision-making. The platform also offers advanced context indexing, which helps the AI understand user intent better. These features could lead to more accurate responses and a more intuitive user experience.
